entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:33 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 10:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
